name: The Hobbit
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A fantasy novel that follows the journey of Bilbo Baggins as he helps a group of dwarves reclaim their homeland.

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A powerful story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: The first book in the magical Harry Potter series.

name: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: An exploration of the American Dream through the life of Jay Gatsby.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel set in a totalitarian society where truth is manipulated and freedom is restricted.

name: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A classic novel about the struggles of a teenage boy named Holden Caulfield.

name: The Da Vinci Code
author: Dan Brown
description: A mystery thriller that follows Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon as he investigates a murder in the Louvre Museum.
